meanings.definition: Capable of being broken down by hydrolysis.
meanings.sent1: The sugar cube was hydrolyzable, easily dissolving in water.
meanings.sent2: The plastic bag was not hydrolyzable, remaining intact even after being submerged in water.
meanings.sent3: The hydrolyzable candy melted in my pocket, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like a hydrolyzable substance, slowly breaking down under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The hydrolyzable paper disintegrated into tiny pieces when exposed to moisture.

meanings.sent1: The hydrolyzable compound reacted quickly when exposed to water.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the hydrolyzable material to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: The hydrolyzable solution bubbled and fizzed as it underwent the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like hydrolyzable bonds, easily broken with the slightest pressure.
meanings.sent5: The hydrolyzable substance transformed into a new compound after undergoing hydrolysis.
